name: Bee Survival
description:
Play as a bee in an unforgiving world. Work to collect pollen to sustain your colony, but bee careful, there be enemies around.

Features:

  • Pollinate flowers to collect nectar for your hive
  • Watch as the world grows as you tend to it
  • Day and night cycles
  • Bring nectar to your hive to generate honey to survive
  • Beware Hornets and Owls. They see you as a tasty treat
  • Look out for flowers that have been infected with pesticides from the nasty humans
  • Act quickly, for when night falls, danger rises
